name: Pirates (FriendlyFrog)
description:
a glorious game full of pirates, treasure, magic, and phongs
made in unity within 48ish hours, the themes were pirates and magitech

The goal is to collect as many treasure chests as you can before they decide to float or drown, and avoid the realistic sharks.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys: move

Space: Jump (it's magic)

Left Click: Launch a cannonball, sort of
